curated_text: Symbol: ABBV. Year: 2025. Period: Q2. ReportType: Q10. Section: Competition and Market Position. This section discusses competitors, market dynamics, and regulatory landscape.  Competitors mentioned: the California Business and Professions Code, the State of, Oregon Circuit Court, AndroGel, sham litigation, MDL, National Prescription Opiate Litigation, the United States Tax Court, AbbVie Inc., Subsidiaries, the Internal Revenue Service, Shareholder and Securities Litigation, Holwill, Humira, Camargo, Allergan Inc., the U.S. Patent Office, the United States Court of Appeals, the Ninth Circuit, Biocell®, Allergan Biocell Textured Breast Implant, Product Liability Litigation, Sheet Metal Workers’ Health Plan of Southern California, Intellectual Property Litigation AbbVie Inc., Rinvoq, Hetero USA, Inc., Hetero Labs Limited Unit-V, Aurobindo Pharma Ltd., Sandoz, Inc., Sandoz Private Limited, Sun Pharmaceutical Industries, Ltd., Aurobindo Pharma U.S.A., Aurobindo Pharma Limited, Zydus Pharmaceuticals, Zydus Lifesciences Limited, MSN Pharmaceuticals Inc., MSN Laboratories Private Limited, MSN Life Sciences Private Limited, Hetero USA Inc., Hetero Labs Limited Unit-III, Merck Sharp & Dohme, CODM, International 506 352 Total, International 377 499 Total, Neuroscience, Botox Therapeutic, International 7 6 Total, International 21 3 Total, Vyalev United, International 4 4 Total, Lumigan/Ganfort United States, ANALYSIS OF FINANCIAL CONDITION, the Condensed Consolidated Financial Statements, Supplementary Data, Research and Development Research, the European Commission, EC, GCA, the U.S. Food and Drug Administration, FDA, Biologics License Application, the U.S. FDA, BoNT, Emblaveo, aztreonam and avibactam, Percent, United States, Botox Therapeutic United, Juvederm Collection United, Linzess/Constella United, Vraylar, Ubrelvy, Imbruvica, Venclexta, Botox Cosmetic, Juvederm Collection, ImmunoGen, SG&A, Upfront, Non-Operating Expenses (Income, LIQUIDITY, Nimble Therapeutics, Inc., Cerevel Therapeutics, Credit Risk AbbVie. Context excerpt: competition provision of the California Business and Professions Code seeking injunctive relief, restitution, civil penalties and attorneys’ fees. In November 2022, the State of Oregon filed a lawsuit in the Multnomah County, Oregon Circuit Court, alleging that 2011 patent litigation by Abbott with a generic company regarding AndroGel was sham litigation and the settlement of that litigation violated state antitrust law. Oregon also brought a claim under the Oregon False Claims Act, which the court dismissed on October 31, 2024. In March 2025, the court approved the parties’ settlement of this matter. Government Proceedings Lawsuits are pending against Allergan and several other manufacturers generally alleging that they improperly promoted and sold prescription opioid products. Approximately 430 lawsuits are pending against Allergan in federal and state courts. Most of the federal court lawsuits are consolidated for pre-trial purposes in the United States District Court for the Northe

competition provision of the California Business and Professions Code seeking injunctive relief, restitution, civil penalties and attorneys’ fees.
